title: Dialogue Tree and Quest System
description: New version of complex and flexible dialogue system with powerful quest system.
longDescription:
[Quick]

  • Demonstration video and tutorial playlist: Youtube Link
  • Playable demo added now: Download link!


(UPD - 2022)

I am happy to announce all my Unreal Engine content is free now!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

Latest info about content in the video ~ Youtube Link!

Please watch the video, it explains my current situation and info about support.

Also use the discord channel for any questions or support now ~ Discord Link!



[About]

With newest update - Dialogue Tree is now a complex story builder system, the system can create very complex dialogues with non-linear consequences and quests, our dialogues do have built-in cinematics manager, choices, sounds, multi-slot animations, advanced camera system, now this dialogue system can fit any type of project and can be adjusted to your project needs.


Quest system that can work separately from dialogues, with ability to create multi tree quests, with non-linear consequences, ability to control quest flow on the fly, can fit any type of project.

Bonus minimap system with world to 2d and back conversion, customizable icons, multiple world map areas can be used at once, supports capture and texture minimaps.


Does include subsystems from MSL toolkit, fully working localization and saving system, system does already include save/loading functional that loads dialogues/quests at any moment, feature to localize dialogues/quests to other languages, includes settings system from MSL toolkit with input functions, can be replaced by full version of MSL toolkit if you own it.


[Note]

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.


[Extra]

Link to our my Youtube page - https://www.youtube.com/c/MasterDinochan

Link to our my Unreal page - https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Master+Dinochan

Subscribe and follow me to support more free content!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Complex dialogue builder with additional quest and minimap system.
  • Easily can fit any project, can be used to build any dialogue types.
  • Works in single player only, not replicated.
  • Many editable features, includes save-loading and localization support.
  • Dialogues can use cinematic sequences and animations.
  • Bonus blueprint systems from MSL toolkit.


Disk Size: 46.7 MB

Number of Blueprints: 1 system actor, 1 component.

Input: Gamepad/Keyboard/Mouse

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: PC, Consoles, Mobile/Tested only on Win

Supported Target Build Platforms: All/Tested only on Win


New version is compatible with engine versions: 4.19.2-4.26

About version compatibility: The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Newest version 3.0 with totally system redone.
Version is fixed and compatible with 420+
